Html:
Good Morning,

I've noticed that brewfest trinkets are not showing up in the trinket rankings even when equipped. Could this possibly be looked at for the next release? :)

My mage Kehly currently has her's equipped - Dark Iron Smoking Pipe. Kehly / Proudmoore (US) if you need a guinea pig to look at.

Many thanks,
Kehly (Kate)

As a workaround, the Brewfest trinkets are identical to the trinkets that G'eras sells.  Your Pipe has the same stats as the Icon of the Silver Crescent.

Edit: The Pipe has the same stats as the OLD Icon.  I've submitted a bug report.  The Pipe has 43/155 while the Icon has 44/158.
